'''Sweetness of the Sea''' is [[Sigewinne]]'s Default [[Character Outfit]].

==Appearance==
<!-- Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 1-2 paragraphs (preferably 1 paragraph) with 3-4 sentences each. -->
Sigewinne's hair is tied in pigtails by two white pom-poms. Atop her head, she wears a nurse's cap, adorned with small gold trinkets. 

Her outfit is a turquoise undercoat with a large pink bow combined with a golden fastener. Her sleeves have golden patterns with white cuffs and a pink stripe, with two gold heart-shaped buttons attached to them. She also wears a pair of white gloves. Overtop, she wears a white apron with gold clips on the top and a heart-shaped pocket on the bottom. Her apron is adorned with multiple pink and blue bowties arranged around the hem. A golden heart-shaped ornament is attached to the apron with a heart monitor in the middle; the monitor shows a broken heart on the left side and a normal heart on the right. Underneath that are a set of black shorts with golden print, that have open sides revealing some white ruffles. The shorts are rolled up, revealing a white underside, and are held in place by bunny-shaped gold clips. Furthermore, she sports white tights with light blue and pink decals on the sides.

Sigewinne's footwear is a set of black moccasin-style shoes with blue-striped socks, along with short ankle warmers that have blue ribbons and are held on with 2 golden buttons each. On her back, there is a pink bow with her {{Ousia}}-aligned {{Hydro}} [[Vision]] attached and a pair of white decorative wings on top of the Vision.
